description:
So far we don't know much about the plot of "Girls" Season 4, but this week we got a tiny clue as to what's to come.我们已经很久没有《衰姐们》第四季的消息了，不过本周我们知道了一些消息。

Zachary Quinto was spotted out in Brooklyn (June 18) with "Girls" creator and star Lena Dunham. Zachary Quinto在布鲁克林被拍到和《衰姐们》制片人和演员Lena Dunham一起出现。

Quinto's impressive list of credits includes "American Horror Story", "24," and "Heroes," as well as portraying Spock in the latest "Star Trek" films. Quinto之前在《美国恐怖故事》《24小时》和《英雄》的出演还有电影《星际迷航》中扮演的Spock都给观众们留下了深刻印象。

Curious what Quinto's arrival means for "Girls", did Hannah decide to kiss her graduate school dreams goodbye? 你好奇Quiinto的出现，会给《衰姐们》带来什么吗？Hannah会和她的毕业生活吻别吗？

"Girls" is set to return to HBO in early 2015. 《衰姐们》将会在2015年初回归HBO电视台。

title: Zachary Quinto将客串《衰姐们》
